duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with product and engineering teams to design experiments, new features, and improvements for video applications across multiple platforms.
Create UI/UX deliverables and provide guidance/support throughout the client development process.
Bring proven knowledge of the user-centered design process methods to digital applications from concept to launch.
Design mockups to support product requirements.
Build prototypes for user testing and developer handoff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Design, Digital Media, or a related field (Master's preferred)
